mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(MEM_ID, MEM_PASSWORD, MEM_FAVOR, MEM_BIRTH, MEM_GENDER, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_PHONE, MEM_CHECK, MEM_DAY, MEM_PROFILE, MEM_AUTH) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{favor, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{check}, SYSDATE, #{profile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auth, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE MEM_EMAIL=#{email} AND MEM_AUTH=#{auth}
SELECT * FROM member WHERE MEM_ID=#{id} AND MEM_PASSWORD=#{pw}

mapper.update: UPDATE member SET MEM_PASSWORD=#{pw}, MEM_FAVOR=#{favor, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEM_BIRTH=#{birth}, MEM_GENDER=#{gender}, MEM_EMAIL=#{email}, MEM_PHONE=#{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEM_CHECK=#{check}, MEM_PROFILE=#{profile, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE MEM_ID=#{id}
